name: Interstate Drifter 2000
description:
The Interstate Drifters race each other and fight the system in this
pixelated arcade style 2d driving game.
Use different types of cars and powerups, rack up your score, and don't get busted.

Features:
-Open game world
-Simple & unique gameplay, but hard to master
-Hardcore game mode
-Retro color palettes
-CTR-filter and other screen effects
-Xbox controller support
-Local highscores/achievements
-Steam highscores/achievements/Badges

Designed and developed by ULTIMO.
